isDummyPersistence

public boolean isDummyPersistence()
Specified by:
isDummyPersistence in interface Persistence
Returns:
true if persistence is disabled, except for "returnBytes" state-capture persistence

getPersistenceTime

public long getPersistenceTime()
Gets the system time when persistence should be performed. We do persistence periodically with a period such that all the plugins will, on the average create persistence deltas with their individual periods. The average frequence of persistence is the sum of the individual media frequencies. Frequency is the reciprocal of period. The computation is:

  T = 1/(1/T1 + 1/T2 + ... + 1/Tn)

Specified by:
getPersistenceTime in interface Persistence
Returns:
the time of the next persistence delta

rehydrate

public RehydrationResult rehydrate(PersistenceEnvelope oldObjects,
                                   java.lang.Object state)
Rehydrate a persisted agent. Reads all the deltas in order keeping the latest (last encountered) values from every object.

Specified by:
rehydrate in interface Persistence
Parameters:
oldObjects - Changes recorded in all but the last delta.
Returns:
List of all envelopes that have not yet been distributed

getSubscriberStateKeys

public java.util.Set getSubscriberStateKeys()
Get a set of the Keys of the SubscriberStates in the rehydration info. Used by the Distributor to track which subscribers have not rehydrated.

Specified by:
getSubscriberStateKeys in interface Persistence

persist

public PersistenceObject persist(java.util.List epochEnvelopes,

                                 boolean returnBytes,
                                 boolean full,
                                 MessageManager messageManager,
                                 java.lang.Object quiescenceMonitorState)
End a persistence epoch by generating a persistence delta.

Specified by:
persist in interface Persistence
Parameters:
epochEnvelopes - All envelopes from this epoch that have been distributed. The effect of these envelopes has already been captured in the subscriber inboxes or in the consequential outboxes which are in undistributedEnvelopes.
undistributedEnvelopes - Envelopes that have not yet been distributed
subscriberStates - The subscriber states to record
